wikipedia_page.main: Mark Christopher Dobson (born 24 October 1967) is a former English professional cricketer.  Dobson was a right-handed batsman who bowled slow left-arm orthodox. He was born at Canterbury in Kent.

response: He became coach of the England women's team on 16 April 2008, following the sudden resignation of Mark Dobson midway through a tour of Australia and New Zealand. He coached England to victories in both the 2009 World Cup and Twenty/20 Championship.
